pageProduct.name: Wanderlust Elderflower 90ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to relieve symptoms of the common cold and sore throat.

Wanderlust Elderflower is a consciously created plant active in a readily absorbed liquid herbal extract. Elderflower is traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to relieve symptoms of the common cold and sore throat and as an expectorant to clear respiratory tract mucous.

Size: 90 mL

Warnings

Adults only.

If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional.

Ingredients

EACH 3.5 mL CONTAINS:
Sambucus nigra (Elderflower) flower. ext. liquid 3.15 mL
Derived from dry----- 3.15 g

Also contains glycerol and orange oil.
Contains 22.5% alcohol.

No added gluten, dairy, lactose, egg, artificial colours or artificial flavours.
Suitable for vegetarians and vegans.

You can expect a bitter taste which is typical of herbal extracts and all of their goodness.

Complemented with natural orange oil.

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - ADULT DOSAGE:
Using the measured dropper take 3.5 mL daily, or as directed by your healthcare practitioner. Drop directly onto the tongue or dilute in 30 mL of water or juice and consume immediately. Follow with a glass of water if necessary.

Shake well before use.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C in a cool, dry place away from direct heat and sunlight. Do not use if cap seal is missing or broken.
